display.title: Current Study Level - Ready to Experience New Phenomena
display.description: You're fully rested and you've reviewed every tome in your library. Your knowledge is at its peak, and you are fully prepared for any adventure you may choose to take on. Nothing is more powerful than you are, armed with the vast knowledge you have on hand right now. Your mana recharges 20 points per second, to a maximum of 1000 mana!
